about_the_game:
Lead the brave mice, take control of the economy and defense of the new-born kingdom, which the mice have been dreaming of for so long, persecuted from everywhere by their enemies. During the day, you have to rebuild buildings and assemble troops to face your enemies at night and prevent them from conquering the proud mice. Fight to the end!

Features

  • Meditative gameplay: During the day, you seek a balance between economy and defense while enjoying pleasant music and beautiful graphics. At night, watch your army fights back against enemies

  • Become the King of Mice: Choose a weapon and lead the defense of your kingdom. After each night, the king gains experience from the battle, and you can assemble a unique build from different characteristics and abilities of your hero

  • Unique maps: Immerse yourself in the beautiful fairy-tale world of the kingdom of mice, which stretches from the hot deserts in the South to the icy mountains in the North.

  • Modifiers and Quests: The game features many different modifiers that can change the rules of the game, and completing quests will unlock more content

  • Building your own kingdom: the meta gameplay of the game takes place on a global map, where you must return the mice to their lands and restore the kingdom! Capture territories, rebuild the capital, discover and explore more of the world of valiant mice

EARLY ACCESS

We will add new locations, modifiers and weapons for the King to the game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

short_description: Cheddar's Crusade is a beautiful and meditative strategy game about brave mice that want to build and defend their kingdom from hordes of evil enemies
